sentences.en: As an experiment, we bought Ted a watch.
sentences.cn: 我们试着给特德买了一块手表。

sentences.en: From the observation booth, we watched Ted and his therapist through the one-way glass.
sentences.cn: 我们在观察室透过单向玻璃注视着特德和他的治疗师。

sentences.en: He began informally to handle Ted's tax affairs for him.
sentences.cn: 他开始非正式地为特德打理税务。

sentences.en: I'm sure Ted is tootling down the motorway at this very moment.
sentences.cn: 我确信泰德此刻正悠闲自得地开车行驶在高速路上。

sentences.en: It came as a shock to hear an old friend speak so honestly about Ted.
sentences.cn: 听到一位老朋友如此坦率地谈起特德真让人大吃一惊。

sentences.en: It is doubtful whether Ted, even with his fluent French, passed for one of the locals.
sentences.cn: 尽管特德能说一口流利的法语，但他是否会被当成当地人仍值得怀疑。

sentences.en: Ted and I took it in turns to go into hospital and sit with Emma.
sentences.cn: 我和特德轮流去医院陪护埃玛。

sentences.en: Ted hated parties, even gatherings of people he liked individually.
sentences.cn: 特德讨厌各种派对，即便是他自己喜欢的人的聚会也不例外。

sentences.en: Ted managed to mix business with pleasure.
sentences.cn: 特德设法做到了工作与娱乐两不误。

sentences.en: Ted might benefit from hearing his own voice recorded and played back.
sentences.cn: 听自己声音的录音回放对特德可能会有帮助。

sentences.en: Ted was very particular about the colors he used.
sentences.cn: 特德在用色上非常讲究。

sentences.en: Ted's always been difficult, Mr Kemp — he takes after his dad.
sentences.cn: 肯普先生，特德一直很难相处——像他爸。

sentences.en: The invaders gut ted the village.
sentences.cn: 侵略者把村中财物洗劫一空.

sentences.en: There has been a very one-sided account of her problems with Ted.
sentences.cn: 关于她与特德的问题，有一则非常片面的报道。

sentences.en: This public acknowledgment of Ted's disability pained my mother.
sentences.cn: 这一下大家都知道了特德的残疾，这让母亲非常痛苦。

trans.tran_en: to shake out and loosen (hay), so as to dry it
